pages.text: $(li)This Enchantment can only be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/backpacked/backpack)$(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you enchant your $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l) with the Marksman enchantment, your $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l) will be able to retrieve $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) directly from your $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l).
pages.title: Marksman
